thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 9 of 634
thread.title: Jess Henry

author: Jess Henry
title: Jess Henry
text: products are always great quality, with pictures and reviews provided to help decide! Sometimes the orders take a long time to be shipped out. I ordered a few things over one month ago now, and the order still hasn't been shipped out yet because of an item still waiting to be stocked, despite it having had been stocked when I ordered it. Other than that, orders usually arrive without hassle or long wait and I've loved shopping from this store for a long time and will continue!
